author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SSP Group Says To Consolidate Shares
text:
April 16 (Reuters) - SSP Group PLC:
* SHARE CONSOLIDATION AND ADMISSION OF NEW ORDINARY SHARES * EVERY 31 EXISTING ORDINARY SHARES OF 1 PENNY EACH WILL BE SUBDIVIDED AND CONSOLIDATED INTO 30 NEW ORDINARY SHARES OF 1/30 PENCE EACH
* SHAREHOLDERS WILL OWN SAME PROPORTION OF COMPANY AS THEY DID PRIOR TO SHARE CONSOLIDATION, SO FAR AS POSSIBLE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
